title: Four Reasons Why You Need to Travel to London
text:
Four Reasons Why You Need to Travel to London Four Reasons Why You Need to Travel to London 0 
"You find no man, at all intellectual, who is willing to leave London. No, Sir, when a man is tired of London, he is tired of life; for there is in London all that life can afford." 
This quote by Samuel Johnson pretty much sums it up - London is the place to be. From thrilling theatre to mouth-watering meals, from infamous tourist attractions to some of the best shopping destinations on earth, it is a city that promises you plenty of memories that are sure to last a lifetime. Here are just four reasons why you need to take advantage of holiday specials and book your airline tickets to London today! 
The West End Theatres 
Broadway is so over-rated compared to that of the West End as it boasts some of the finest theatre in the world. Why not book a ticket to one of the newest features or opt to see one of the long running shows? Long-running favourites include: Mamma Mia! - Currently in its 16th year of continuous performances (Novello Theatre) The Lion King - Currently in its 16th year of continuous performances (Lyceum Theatre) Billy Elliot: The Musical - Currently in its 10th year of continuous performances (Victoria Palace Theatre) Wicked - Currently in its 9th year of continuous performances (Apollo Victoria Theatre) War Horse - Currently in its 6th year of continuous performances (New London Theatre) 
Buckingham Palace 
The home of the royal family, Buckingham Palace is probably the most popular tourist attraction within the capital city of England. Annually, thousands of people visit the palace, many of which are hoping to get a glimpse of royalty from behind the curtains. Unfortunately, this rarely happens. Luckily though, it is possible to view the changing of the guard. Get to this hotspot by 11 AM and you will be able to experience the ceremony for yourself! 
The Shopping 
When visiting London, be sure to hit the stores for some retail therapy! There are many different types to choose from - luxury stores like Harrods, bargain fashion must-haves at the markets, and Armani Junior for the little ones.
